item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates
item.description:
Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates

Winter may be officially over in the Northern Hemisphere, but that doesn't mean hot chocolate has to disappear from people's radar until temperatures cool again. For some of us, it makes for a viable alternative to coffee in the morning-with some serious sugar and cocoa kick.

item.title: Wearable Sun Protection
item.description:
Wearable Sun Protection

There's no faster way to throw shade on a warm weather vacation (or the first few hot days of spring) than with sunburn. It takes only 15 minutes of direct sunlight exposure for skin damage to begin occurring, so protection is a must.
